about_the_game:
Go through the plot like reading a novel, and then choose an option to achieve a good ending

Nicotine vs. Lotus Source

The light of domestic production in the new era! Let's manipulate Ruike Wu together and enter the world of Ding Zhen, defeat Furong Wangyuan to dominate this world! Anyway, it's a free game that makes you laugh for half an hour. Why not?

Background of the story

Litang County is a place where humans and animal mothers coexist. Litang's technology has been ahead of human civilization for fifty years, and as Ding Zhen, you are the god prophesied by Litang's prophets. A god who can swallow clouds and smoke will lead Litang to the world, training troops and suppressing bandits in your hometown to support your younger brother's college education. However, your younger brother is being bullied in the city by others. Angry, you come to the city to seek revenge on Wang Yuan

Gameplay

Defeat the Furong King Source according to the options to achieve victory, explore the ability to manipulate the Sharp Cut Level 5, and defeat the enemy with the correct method

Game Features

The game has 20 endings, 183 CG images, an amazing Litang Divine Comedy, and my own abstract voice acting (which can be turned off in the settings)

The characters, locations, items, and all elements appearing in the game are purely fictional, and any similarities are purely coincidental

Afterwards, I will continue to develop new works to perfect this vast worldview
